page.title: 15Means of Travel in Ceres
page.content:
The majority of people in the area have cars. They use them mainly for work and shopping.
Cycling is very popular with children but not with adults possibly because Ceres is almost surrounded by hills.
The buses are used mainly by senior citizens, who enjoy free travel, and younger people under seventeen. There is an hourly bus service to Cupar, the nearest town, and this is used most often.
The nearest railway station is in Cupar and travel by rail is used mainly for visits to Edinburgh and Dundee for shopping.
